main_menu_items.title: Select calendar
main_menu_items.description:
Choose a calendar from your Google calendars.
The default one is the primary calendar.

main_menu_items.title: List events
main_menu_items.description: List all events in your chosen calendar.

main_menu_items.title: Create event
main_menu_items.description: Create a new event for your chosen calendar.
